original_title: 昭和残侠伝 唐獅子仁義
overview: Hidejuro is sent to prison after killing the boss of a rival family. After being released, he discovers that his family has scattered and he is taken in by a company of quarry workers, whose boss has a strict code of non-violence. When the rival family tries to take over the company and kills their boss, Hidejuro must choose between his promise of non-violence and his yakuza code of revenge...
title: Brutal Tales of Chivalry 5: Man With The Karajishi Tattoo
